divs: sighting detailsmy wife came in the house came inside saying i have to come see this so i went outside saw a blue electric\gas cloud with a ufo not too far from it. i took out my phone and started recording the object. then it paused and dropped an object out that trailed behind it, then paused. we also saw at the time it opened that it started to glow very bright and let out a weird gas like substances. the video is on my iphone couldn't zoom in but u can see the crafts and the glowing gas when it opens
Summary: Came out of no where and it was a beautiful display of lights and mist
